testcase.name: Student Admission

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given a user is on the login page "https://mexil.it/chroma_tech_academy/dev/site/login".skipped When user logs in with valid credentials username "general@teacher.com" and password "123456".skipped And navigates to Student Information Module.................................skipped And navigates to Student Admission Submodule................................skipped Then user is directed to Student Admission page with the text "Student Admission".skipped And enters Student unique Admission Number "12345"..........................skipped And selects Class "SDET" and Section "Testing Fundamentals".................skipped And enters Students first name "CHROMA" and last name "TECH"................skipped And selects gender "Female".................................................skipped And enters Date of Birth "04/01/1990".......................................skipped And for Parent Guardian Details enters mothers name "CHROMA MOM"............skipped And for If Guardian Is field clicks on Mother radio button..................skipped And enters Guardian Phone number "7036875816"...............................skipped When user clicks on save button.............................................skipped Then student is succesfully saved and confirmation message displays "Record Saved Successfully".skipped When user navigates to Bulk Delete submodule................................skipped And for Bulk Delete selects Class "SDET" and Section "Testing Fundamentals".skipped And clicks search button....................................................skipped Then admitted student "Chroma Tech" is deleted for testing purposes.........skipped Then admitted student with first name "CHROMA" and last name "TECH" is deleted for testing purposes.undefined
